title: Maize Seed (Certified Hybrid)
short: High yield certified hybrid maize seed.
long: Certified hybrid maize seed suitable for Ghanaian climates. High germination, drought resistant, recommended for small and medium farms.

title: Balanced NPK Fertilizer (25kg)
short: Balanced NPK fertilizer for improved crop growth.
long: 25kg bag of balanced NPK fertilizer for use on a variety of crops. Improves soil fertility and crop yields when used as directed.

title: Crop Protection - Insecticide (500ml)
short: Broad-spectrum insecticide for common crop pests.
long: 500ml insecticide for control of common pests on vegetables and cereals. Follow label instructions for safe use.
